rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Create a Clue token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]At the dockside market, a pouch of gold can get you materials, weaponry, or, if you're lucky, a true pirate's quest.[/i]

 - Metalcraft
